description_html: Imprints of natural phenomena etched into a crystalline substrate, SLANT® panels unleash a dynamic play of light in any space. Resin cladding enables them to be ultra-thin and lightweight, with hundreds of pattern and color combinations available to fit into a variety of design needs. Available in resin or glass, SLANT can be used as flooring, walls, space dividers, counter tops, back splashes and more. It is an architectural products with limited possibilities.
